entry.title: Updates on My Website and Upcoming Events

link.title: Updates on My Website and Upcoming Events

entry.content:
Update on June 17, 2025

I’ve made several updates to my website:

  • Updated the CV with a json-based format for easier parsing and integration.
  • Updated the news section with recent activities and achievements.
  • Updated the about page to reflect my current focus on AI and cloud-native architectures

I’m also prepare a new SpinOff project about AI-driven document processing and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) systems, which will be announced soon.

This morning I registered for Red Hat (Developer Day Rome), on July 10, 2025. Looking forward to networking with fellow developers and learning about the latest in cloud-native technologies.
